explanation: This is a lower bound problem - find the first position where the value >= target. Use binary search with left < right. If nums[mid] < target, the answer is in the right half (left = mid + 1). Otherwise, the answer is at mid or in the left half (right = mid). Return left as the insert position. Time: O(log n), Space: O(1).
